name: Li Annan
body:
### Biography

***

Scientist

Institute for Infocomm Research (I2R), Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR), Singapore.

### Research Interests

***

Computer Vision, Pattern Recognition, Medical Image Analysis, Statistical Learning

### Publications

***

**Book Chapter**

* Annan Li, , Luoqi Liu, Shuicheng Yan. Person Re-identification by Attribute-Assisted Clothes Appearance. Person Re-Identification. pp. 119--138, 2014.

**Journal**

* Annan Li, Min Lin, Yi Wu, Ming-Hsuan Yang and Shuicheng Yan. NUS-PRO: A New Visual Tracking Challenge. IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence. Vol.38, No.2, pp. 335--349, 2016.
* Annan Li*, Luoqi Liu*, Kang Wang, Si Liu and Shuicheng Yan. Clothing Attributes Assisted Person Re-identification. IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems for Video Technology.  Vol.25, No.5, pp. 869--878, 2015.
* Annan Li and Shuicheng Yan. Object Tracking With Only Background Cues. IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems for Video Technology.  Vol.24, No.11, pp. 1911--1919, 2014.
* Bingpeng Ma, Annan Li, Xiujuan Chai and Shiguang Shan. CovGa: A Novel Descriptor Based on Symmetry of Regions for Head Pose Estimation. Neurocomputing. Vol. 143, pp. 97--108, 2014.    
* Annan Li, Shiguang Shan and Wen Gao. Coupled Bias-Variance Trade off for Cross-Pose Face Recognition. IEEE Transactions on Image Processing, Vol.21, No.1, pp. 305-315, January 2012.
* Annan Li, Shiguang Shan, Xilin Chen and Wen Gao. Cross-Pose Face Recognition Based on Partial Least Squares. Pattern Recognition Letters. Vol(32), No.(15), pp. 1948-1955, November 2011. 

**Conference**

* Annan Li, Jun Cheng, Ai Ping Yow, Carolin Wall, Damon Wing Kee Wong, Hong Liang Tey and Jiang Liu. Epidermal Segmentation in High-Definition Optical Coherence Tomography. International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society, pp. 3045--3048, 2015.
* Ai Ping Yow, Jun Cheng, Annan Li, Carolin Wall, Jiang Liu, Damon Wing Kee Wong and Hong Liang Tey. An Automated System for Skin Surface Topographic Assessment Using in Vivo HD-OCT. International Conference on Information, Communications and Signal Processing, 2015.
* Annan Li, Jun Cheng, Damon Wing Kee Wong and Jiang Liu. A Comparative Study on Macular Optical Coherence Tomography Image Alignment. IEEE Conference on Biomedical Engineering and Sciences, 2014.
* Annan Li, Jun Cheng, Damon Wing Kee Wong, Hong Liang Tey and Jiang Liu. Structure-Preserving Multi-Scale Decompositions for Skin and Retinal OCT Image. IEEE Conference on Biomedical Engineering and Sciences, 2014.   
* Bingpeng Ma, Annan Li, Xiujuan Chai and Shiguang Shan. Head Yaw Estimation via Symmetry of Regions. IEEE International Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition, 2013.   
* Annan Li, Shiguang Shan, Xilin Chen and Wen Gao. Face Recognition Based on Non-Corresponding Region Matching. In proceeding of 13th International Conference on Computer Vision, Barcelona, Spain, November 6-13, 2011.    
* Annan Li, Shiguang Shan, Xilin Chen and Wen Gao. Maximizing Intra-individual Correlations for Face Recognition Across Pose Differences. in Proceedings of IEEE Computer Society Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition, Miami Beach, Florida, USA, pp. 605-611, Jun.20-25, 2009.  
* Annan Li, Shiguang Shan, Xilin Chen, Xiujuan Chai and Wen Gao. Recovering 3D Facial Shape via Coupled 2D/3D Space Learning. IEEE International Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition, 2008.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
